Get Bugphyzz Signatures

Source: R/bugphyzz.R
getBugphyzzSignatures.Rd

getBugphyzzSignatures convert data to signatures

getBugphyzzSignatures(
  df,
  tax.id.type = "NCBI_ID",
  tax.level = "mixed",
  evidence = c("asr", "inh", "exp", "tas", "nas", "igc"),
  frequency = c("unknown", "always", "usually", "sometimes"),
  min.size = 5
)

Arguments

df

A data.frame

tax.id.type

NCBI_ID or Taxon_name.

tax.level

Domain to strain.

evidence

asr, inh, exp, igc, nas, tas

frequency

unknown, sometimes, usually, always

min.size

Default 5.

Value

List of signatures

Examples


library(purrr)
bp <- importBugphyzz()
#> Downloading, full_dump_categorical.csv.bz2.
#> Using data downloaded on 2023-04-04 07:16:56.
my_fun <- function(x) {
  getBugphyzzSignatures(
    df = x, tax.id.type = 'Taxon_name', tax.level = 'species', min.size = 5,
    frequency = 'always'
  )
}
o <- flatten(map(bp, my_fun))
#> Error in map(bp, my_fun): ℹ In index: 1.
#> ℹ With name: NCBI_ID.
#> Caused by error in `df$Rank`:
#> ! $ operator is invalid for atomic vectors
